resources.string:
This app enables the visualisation of earthquake data collected by The United States Geological Survey (USGS). When using marker mode, a marker will be placed at the location of each earthquake. The larger the marker, the higher the magnitude. Alternatively, heatmap mode will allow you to observe the concentration of earthquakes.

Customisation features:

• Modify the color of focused/unfocused markers.
• View earthquakes in chronological order.
• While in map view, shake the phone to go to a random earthquake.
• Mark your current location.
• The number of earthquakes processed.
• Only the most significant earthquakes from 1950 to the present day.
• Auto updating database.
